landing_title: Welcome to the Home of the Shipman Society
landing_description: The Shipman Society was founded in 1996 for recipients of the Sidney J. and Irene Shipman Scholarship for incoming first-year undergraduates at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor. The society, in its dedication to scholarship, leadership, and service, holds bi- weekly meetings and organizes social and community service events, as well as Shipman Weekend, an introduction and interview process for Shipman Scholarship nominees held in March.
